Journal.Title: The British journal of general practice : the journal of the Royal College of General Practitioners

Article.ArticleTitle: Long COVID in children: the perspectives of parents and children need to be heard.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Founding Member of Long Covid Kids and LongCovidSOS (https://www.longcovidsos.org); Lecturer in Psychology, Coventry University. Email: ac7768@coventry.ac.uk@FrancesorFran.
Central Manchester; Professor of General Practice Research, Keele University. @CizCG.

Consultant Obstetrician & Gynaecologist and Honorary Associate Professor, University College London (UCL); Deputy Lead of Clinical and Professional Practice, UCL Medical School (MS); Student Support Tutor, UCLMS; Deputy Lead of Undergraduate Women's Health Whittington Campus, UCLMS. @Docamali.
